argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscyg.1 | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | iscyg.2 | |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | iscyg3.e | |- E = { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. x ) ) = B } |
| 4 |  | cyggenod.o | |- O = ( od ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_iscyggen | |- ( X e. E <-> ( X e. B /\ ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) = B ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simplbi | |- ( X e. E -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 4, 2, 7 | #P_dfod2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( O ` X ) = if ( ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) e. Fin , ( # ` ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) ) , 0 ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. E ) -> ( O ` X ) = if ( ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) e. Fin , ( # ` ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) ) , 0 ) ) |
| 10 | 5 | #P_simprbi | |- ( X e. E -> ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) = B ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. E ) -> ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) = B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. E ) -> ( ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) e. Fin <-> B e. Fin ) ) |
| 13 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. E ) -> ( # ` ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) ) = ( # ` B ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ifbieq1d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. E ) -> if ( ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) e. Fin , ( # ` ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) ) , 0 ) = if ( B e. Fin , ( # ` B ) , 0 ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. E ) -> ( O ` X ) = if ( B e. Fin , ( # ` B ) , 0 ) ) |
